amendment.description: Amendment prohibits use of funds from being expended on any General Management Plan other than Alternative B for the visitors center at Castillo de San Marcos National Monument in St. Augustine, Florida.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to implement Alternative A, Alternative C, or Alternative D, described in the Final General Management Plan and Environmental Impact Statement for Castillo de San Marcos National Monument in St. Augustine, Florida, visitors center.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mica amendment (A101) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Mica amendment (A101) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A101) offered by Mr. Mica.
